name: cssgui
description: Simple minimalist CSS GUI framework and boilerplate based on bootstrap grid.

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/ -o dist/css/
scripts.save: git add .; git commit -m 'New Release'; git push; npm version patch; npm publish; git push;

author: fantasyui.com <fantasyui.com@gmail.com>
